import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.PrintWriter;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.LinkedList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.TreeMap;


class ACMwarmup {

       
	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {

                PrintWriter out=new PrintWriter(System.out);
                Reader.init(System.in);
                int monval,k,y,date,ones,tens,huns;
                String str[],cm;
                int tc=Reader.nextInt();
                int i=1;
                while(i<=tc)
                {   
                    str=Reader.next().split("-");
                    k=28;
                    y=Integer.parseInt(str[2]);
                    if(y%400==0 || (y%4==0 && y%100!=0))k++;
                    monval=0;date=Integer.parseInt(str[0]);
                    if(str[1].equals("JAN"))monval=0;
                    else if(str[1].equals("FEB"))monval=31;
                    else if(str[1].equals("MAR"))monval=31+k;
                    else if(str[1].equals("APR"))monval=31+k+31;
                    else if(str[1].equals("MAY"))monval=31+k+31+30;
                    else if(str[1].equals("JUN"))monval=31+k+31+30+31;
                    else if(str[1].equals("JUL"))monval=31+k+31+30+31+30;
                    else if(str[1].equals("AUG"))monval=31+k+31+30+31+30+31;
                    else if(str[1].equals("SEP"))monval=31+k+31+30+31+30+31+31;
                    else if(str[1].equals("OCT"))monval=31+k+31+30+31+30+31+31+30;
                    else if(str[1].equals("NOV"))monval=31+k+31+30+31+30+31+31+30+31;
                    else if(str[1].equals("DEC"))monval=31+k+31+30+31+30+31+31+30+31+30;
                    monval+=date;
                    if(monval>360){monval-=360;cm="Ones";}
                    else if(monval>300){monval-=300; cm="Tens";}
                    else cm="Hundreds";

                    out.println("Case "+i+": "+monval+" "+cm);
                    i++;
                }
                out.close();
                  }

      

}



 class Reader {
    static BufferedReader reader;
    static StringTokenizer tokenizer;

    /** call this method to initialize reader for InputStream */
    static void init(InputStream input) {
        reader = new BufferedReader(
                     new InputStreamReader(input) );
        tokenizer = new StringTokenizer("");
    }

    /** get next word */
    static String next() throws IOException {
        while ( ! tokenizer.hasMoreTokens() ) {
            //TODO add check for eof if necessary
            tokenizer = new StringTokenizer(
                   reader.readLine() );
        }
        return tokenizer.nextToken();
    }

    static int nextInt() throws IOException {
        return Integer.parseInt( next() );
    }

    static long nextLong() throws IOException {
        return Long.parseLong( next() );
    }

    static double nextDouble() throws IOException {
        return Double.parseDouble( next() );
    }
}
